div.a: Coronavirus Update: We are still under Governor Murphy’s school closure until further notice. Next week we will continue with virtual learning. Please be on the lookout for further updates from your building administrator. Please be safe and healthy.
Visit the new E-Learning Portal to view/download Home Activity Packets and view other useful information and announcements.

div.p: For over a decade, University Heights Charter School has been an anchor primary academic institution in the University Heights section of Newark, NJ. Our mission is to develop in each scholar in grades PK-8 the character, scholarship and leadership necessary for success in life, college, and community.
